Module: AlicateApp

AlicateApp

A module representing an alicate application

This module provides an entry point to your alicate applications. It allows mounting View's on desired paths and provides a way to bind the application to a particular element in the dom, using a css selector.

Version:
  • 1.0
Source:
  • alicateapp.js, line 10

Example

var app = new AlicateApp({
                 templateStore: templates,
                 $selector: '#selector'
             });

return app.mount('/link1', new MyView());

  • Base
